data.text: “I’ve had the most fun with Helen collaborating on a design for some special earrings which she created for me using my input.  I happily own several beautiful pieces - a two strand bracelet I wear everyday - expandable with lovely blue and red stones.  The designs are varied ranging from delicate to bold depending on one’s mood which is also what makes this jewelry unique and cool!”

Helen Suter's jewelry is a refreshing mix of minimalism and spunk. Her pieces are made with unique stones and beads, giving each one its own story. The jewelry has a subtlety in its simplicity that gives it a refined yet original look.
